summary.span: 包含创建和使用可发现服务所必需的类。

span.span: Contains the classes required for the creation and use of discoverable services.

summary.span: 这些类实现 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的 WS-Discovery 协议的 2005 年 4 月版本。

span.span: These classes implement the April 2005 version of the WS-Discovery protocol for Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).
